code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import bookReducer from'./books.reducer';import userReducer from'./user.reducer';import cartReducer from'./cart.reducer';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['cart']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({books:bookReducer,user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
